cast.name: 厄兹格·居雷尔 Özge Gürel
埃尔坎·贝克塔斯 Erkan Bektas
巴萨克·古穆尔辛里奥格鲁 Basak Gümülcinelioglu Çitanak
卡恩·伊德里姆 Kaan Yildirim
贝林·阿里索伊 Berrin Arisoy

introduction: Sipahi follows the impressive story of Korkut Ali Türkoğlu, one of the most talented field men the intelligence agency has trained in recent years as he reaches important information regarding Turkey’s national security after an operation full of action and intelligence. In line with this information, Yıldırım Zafer Bozok (Kerem Alışık), who had retired from the field and whose successful operations in the past were taught as a course at the MIT School, is recalled to duty. There are surprises in operation carried out by Korkut Ali and Yıldırım with a talented team. Kader; brings together the anti-terrorism commissioner Canan (Özge Gürel) and Korkut Ali in the country after going abroad, and the duo's business gets very difficult.
